price: 6. Dat is Hij, de Alwetende van het onzichtbare en het zichtbare, de Almachtige, de Genadevolste.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: dhālika ʿālimu al-ghaybi wal-shahādati al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
